resources.string: You need to agree to go on with the study
Not used, data are read directly from the database
I agree to participate in this research.

Utque aegrum corpus quassari etiam levibus solet offensis, ita animus eius angustus et tener, quicquid increpuisset, ad salutis suae dispendium existimans factum aut cogitatum, insontium caedibus fecit victoriam luctuosam. Pandente itaque viam fatorum sorte tristissima, qua praestitutum erat eum vita et imperio spoliari, itineribus interiectis permutatione iumentorum emensis venit Petobionem oppidum Noricorum, ubi reseratae sunt insidiarum latebrae omnes, et Barbatio repente apparuit comes, qui sub eo domesticis praefuit, cum Apodemio agente in rebus milites ducens, quos beneficiis suis oppigneratos elegerat imperator certus nec praemiis nec miseratione ulla posse deflecti. Rogatus ad ultimum admissusque in consistorium ambage nulla praegressa inconsiderate et leviter proficiscere inquit ut praeceptum est, Caesar sciens quod si cessaveris, et tuas et palatii tui auferri iubebo prope diem annonas. hocque solo contumaciter dicto subiratus abscessit nec in conspectum eius postea venit saepius arcessitus. Quaestione igitur per multiplices dilatata fortunas cum ambigerentur quaedam, non nulla levius actitata constaret, post multorum clades Apollinares ambo pater et filius in exilium acti cum ad locum Crateras nomine pervenissent, villam scilicet suam quae ab Antiochia vicensimo et quarto disiungitur lapide, ut mandatum est, fractis cruribus occiduntur. Harum trium sententiarum nulli prorsus assentior. Nec enim illa prima vera est, ut, quem ad modum in se quisque sit, sic in amicum sit animatus. Quam multa enim, quae nostra causa numquam faceremus, facimus causa amicorum! precari ab indigno, supplicare, tum acerbius in aliquem invehi insectarique vehementius, quae in nostris rebus non satis honeste, in amicorum fiunt honestissime; multaeque res sunt in quibus de suis commodis viri boni multa detrahunt detrahique patiuntur, ut iis amici potius quam ipsi fruantur. Quam ob rem cave Catoni anteponas ne istum quidem ipsum, quem Apollo, ut ais, sapientissimum iudicavit; huius enim facta, illius dicta laudantur. De me autem, ut iam cum utroque vestrum loquar, sic habetote. Horum adventum praedocti speculationibus fidis rectores militum tessera data sollemni armatos omnes celeri eduxere procursu et agiliter praeterito Calycadni fluminis ponte, cuius undarum magnitudo murorum adluit turres, in speciem locavere pugnandi. neque tamen exiluit quisquam nec permissus est congredi. formidabatur enim flagrans vesania manus et superior numero et ruitura sine respectu salutis in ferrum. Huic Arabia est conserta, ex alio latere Nabataeis contigua; opima varietate conmerciorum castrisque oppleta validis et castellis, quae ad repellendos gentium vicinarum excursus sollicitudo pervigil veterum per oportunos saltus erexit et cautos. haec quoque civitates habet inter oppida quaedam ingentes Bostram et Gerasam atque Philadelphiam murorum firmitate cautissimas. hanc provinciae inposito nomine rectoreque adtributo obtemperare legibus nostris Traianus conpulit imperator incolarum tumore saepe contunso cum glorioso marte Mediam urgeret et Parthos. Haec et huius modi quaedam innumerabilia ultrix facinorum impiorum bonorumque praemiatrix aliquotiens operatur Adrastia atque utinam semper quam vocabulo duplici etiam Nemesim appellamus: ius quoddam sublime numinis efficacis, humanarum mentium opinione lunari circulo superpositum, vel ut definiunt alii, substantialis tutela generali potentia partilibus praesidens fatis, quam theologi veteres fingentes Iustitiae filiam ex abdita quadam aeternitate tradunt omnia despectare terrena. Ac ne quis a nobis hoc ita dici forte miretur, quod alia quaedam in hoc facultas sit ingeni, neque haec dicendi ratio aut disciplina, ne nos quidem huic uni studio penitus umquam dediti fuimus. Etenim omnes artes, quae ad humanitatem pertinent, habent quoddam commune vinculum, et quasi cognatione quadam inter se continentur.
I agree to participate in this research.

Please connect your phone to the internet. It is mandatory to have an internet connection to register for a new study. By default, we only use WIFI; if you are willing to use your 3G/LTE connection, please enable this option in the settings of Betrack

Please connect your phone to the internet. It is mandatory to have an internet connection to finish the study. By default, we only use WIFI; if you are willing to use your 3G/LTE connection, please enable this option in the settings of Betrack
Select which study you want to join:
Thank you for participating and see you soon!
Thank you for setting up the app! The daily surveys will start tomorrow.
Thank you for your participation in the study. Please contact us at: smartphonestudy@psych.ubc.ca
You seem to use a battery manager, please whitelist BeTrack or contact the Social Health Lab at: smartphonestudy@psych.ubc.ca
Allow to be temporarily or permanently out of the study
Enable usage of 3G/LTE to transfer study data
Allow to use the 3G/LTE connection to transfer data of the study to our server
Icons made by Freepik and Zlatko Najdenovski

Almost there. Please follow the steps below to give us the permissions that are needed for the app to run on your phone. Moreover, if you use a battery manager, please make sure that BeTrack is white listed.

When you click on the OK button of this window, the settings menu of your phone will open. In that menu, please allow BeTrack to access the statistics of your phone. When you are done, get back to the app and you will be able to start the study.
Please fill in our little survey
requires to be enabled in Protected Apps to function properly.
We need to have to your positioning information to function properly
We need to have to be whitelisted to be able to be exempt from battery optimization
You need to answer that question
East Asian (e.g., Chinese, Japanese, or Korean)
Are you classified as an international student by our university?
Are you a native speaker of English?
How long have you been speaking English (in years)?
Do you consider yourself fluent in English?
If English is not your first language, what test did you take to satisfy the UBC English Language Admission Requirement?
Please specify the English test you took:
What year are you in university?
I am a first year student at UBC
I am a second year student at UBC
I am a third year student at UBC
I am a fourth year student at UBC
Did you transfer to UBC from another post-secondary institution?
How do you feel right now?
How socially connected do you feel right now?
How bored do you feel right now?
How relaxed do you feel right now?
How much have you interacted with other people “directly” (face-to- face or via phone call) since the last time we asked?
How much have you used social networking sites/apps since the last time we asked?
Have you used social networking sites on a device other than your smartphone since the last time we asked?
Which social networking sites did you use?
Have you primarily used social networking sites / apps actively (e.g., send messages or post pictures) or passively (e.g., browse though profiles) since the last time we asked?
What time did you get into bed?
What time did you try to go to sleep?
How long did it take you to fall asleep?
How many times did you wake up, not counting your final awakening?
In total, how long did these awakenings last?
What time was your final awakening?
What time did you get out of bed for the day?
How would you rate the quality of your sleep?
On average, how many hours/minutes per day do you think you spent using your phone in general throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Facebook on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Facebook Messenger on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Instagram on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Google Hangouts on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Google+ on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Twitter on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Pinterest on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Snapchat on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using WhatsApp on your phone throughout the study?
On average, how many hours / minutes per day do you think you spent using Skype on your phone throughout the study?
How interesting and engaging was it for you to participate in this study?
How much did the daily survey interfere with your activities at the time of the alarm?
Would you have minded if the study period had been longer than 10 days?
How easy/difficult was it for you to use the research app?
Would you recommend this study to a friend?
Is there anything in particular you would change about the research app?
